title: This service keeps a license on user-generated content even after users close their accounts.

tosdr.case: This service keeps a license on user-generated content even after users close their accounts.
tosdr.tldr: The Terms of Use (in Part A, applicable to users not in Europe) state, "By posting Your Content on the Brainly Services you irrevocably grant Brainly worldwide, non-exclusive, irrevocable, assignable and transferable perpetual rights to use Your Content."
